id.description: The unique numeric ID of the brand; increments sequentially.

image_url.description: Image URL used for this category on the storefront. Images can be uploaded via form file post to `/brands/{brandId}/image`, or by providing a publicly accessible URL in this field.

meta_keywords.description: Comma-separated list of meta keywords to include in the HTML.

name.description: The name of the brand. Must be unique.

page_title.description: The title shown in the browser while viewing the brand.

search_keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that can be used to locate this brand.

requestBody.description: Returns a `Brand` from the BigCommerce Catalog.

schema.description: Response payload for the Bigcommerce API.
